channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, for east midlands
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

item.title: M1 southbound between J17 and J16 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M1 southbound between junctions J18 and J16, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.
